metadata.title: CVE-2022-41138 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In Zutty before 0.13, DECRQSS in text written to the terminal can achievearbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-41138` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zutty - 0.13.2.20221029.103432+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zutty package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.2.20221029.103432+dfsg1-1').
